title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. VII, subch. B, art. 2, pt. 480 - Remuneration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. VII, subch. B, art. 2, pt. 480 - Remuneration

State Regulations
§ 480.1 - Value of board and lodging
§ 480.2 - Tips of beauty parlor operators
§ 480.3 - Tips of garage, gas station and parking lot attendants
§ 480.4 - Tips of service employees in restaurants
§ 480.5 - Tips of dining room employees in american plan hotels and in eating clubs
§ 480.6 - Tips of hotel service employees
§ 480.7 - Tips of taxicab drivers
§ 480.8 - Tips of employees in barber shops
§ 480.9 - Tips of baggage porters in bus and airline terminals
§ 480.10 - Tips of pinboys at bowling alleys
§ 480.11 - Tips for checkroom attendants
§ 480.12 - Tips of maritime service employees

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. VII, subch. B, art. 2, pt. 480

Statutory authority: Labor Law, §§517, 530; art. 18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
